thread.title: BRIEF-Orava Asuntorahasto Board Investigates Converting Co Into Investment Company

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Orava Asuntorahasto Board Investigates Converting Co Into Investment Company

organizations.name: brief-orava asuntorahasto board investigates converting co into investment company

text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - ORAVA ASUNTORAHASTO OYJ:
* REG-THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF ORAVA RESIDENTIAL REIT IS INVESTIGATING THE POSSIBILITIES FOR CONVERTING THE COMPANY INTO AN INVESTMENT COMPANY AS AN ALTERNATIVE TO A REIT
* SAYS ‍ARRIVED AT OPINION THAT CURRENT LISTED REIT IS NOT AN IDEAL STRUCTURE FOR FUTURE DEVELOPMENT
* ‍WILL INITIATE NEGOTIATIONS ON MATTER WITH STOCK EXCHANGE, FINANCIAL SUPERVISORY AUTHORITY AND FINANCIERS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
